name: INSCAPE (Salanderous)
description:
A game about getting in to an exploding building.

Known Bugs:

  • tabbing outside of the game can cause the controls to stop responding.
  • Text will overlap if a new dialogue is started before the previous one is finished

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: Space or Z

Dash: Shift or X

Dialogue: Enter or C
